timedLyrics:
1
00:00:31,982 --> 00:00:41,892
For lonely girls, it's always the same, dreaming dreams that don't come true

2
00:00:41,892 --> 00:00:51,768
And churning, churning through the clamor in their heads

3
00:00:51,768 --> 00:01:01,478
( )

4
00:01:01,478 --> 00:01:11,354
A lonely girl mutters "I'm fine", have words failed her?

5
00:01:11,354 --> 00:01:13,623
A failure, a failure.

6
00:01:13,623 --> 00:01:21,198
Obsessing over her mistakes makes everything spin again!

7
00:01:21,198 --> 00:01:21,198
( )

8
00:01:21,198 --> 00:01:23,533
One more time, one more time

9
00:01:23,533 --> 00:01:25,936
“I'll roll along today”

10
00:01:25,936 --> 00:01:28,405
The girl said, the girl said

11
00:01:28,405 --> 00:01:31,174
Breathing life into the words!

12
00:01:31,174 --> 00:01:32,209
“How about now?”

13
00:01:32,209 --> 00:01:40,951
“Not yet, we still can't see what's ahead. Hold your breath, for now.”

14
00:01:40,951 --> 00:01:50,927
( )

15
00:01:50,927 --> 00:02:00,570
This is how it ends for a Rolling Girl, unable to reach the colors on the other side

16
00:02:00,570 --> 00:02:10,413
The overlapping voices, they blend together, blend together

17
00:02:10,413 --> 00:02:20,257
She mutters, "I'm fine.", but the words fail her

18
00:02:20,257 --> 00:02:22,692
Not caring how it ends

19
00:02:22,692 --> 00:02:29,900
An upward climb that invites mistakes

20
00:02:29,900 --> 00:02:29,900
( )

21
00:02:29,900 --> 00:02:32,435
One more time, one more time

22
00:02:32,435 --> 00:02:35,005
Please, get me rolling

23
00:02:35,005 --> 00:02:37,340
The girl said, the girl said

24
00:02:37,340 --> 00:02:40,043
With her intense silence!

25
00:02:40,043 --> 00:02:41,144
“How about now?”

26
00:02:41,144 --> 00:02:49,819
“Just a little more, We should see something soon. Hold your breath, for now.”

27
00:02:49,819 --> 00:02:49,819
( )

28
00:02:49,819 --> 00:02:52,088
One more time, one more time

29
00:02:52,088 --> 00:02:54,691
“I'll roll along again today”

30
00:02:54,691 --> 00:02:57,027
The girl said, the girl said

31
00:02:57,027 --> 00:02:59,663
Breathing laughter into the words!

32
00:02:59,663 --> 00:03:04,668
“How about now? OK, you can look. You must be exhausted too, right?”

33
00:03:04,668 --> 00:03:09,573
We’ll hold our breath, right now.

1
00:00:28,340 --> 00:00:30,260
Can’t we put an end today

2
00:00:30,260 --> 00:00:32,040
To spitting out indifferent words

3
00:00:32,040 --> 00:00:35,200
And crying over those memories?

4
00:00:35,200 --> 00:00:36,900
Waiting for the “1, 2…” signal

5
00:00:36,900 --> 00:00:38,880
Holding hands with you is

6
00:00:38,880 --> 00:00:41,760
An act of courage for me

7
00:00:41,760 --> 00:00:41,760
( )

8
00:00:41,760 --> 00:00:43,380
Phase <1>

9
00:00:43,380 --> 00:00:46,640
‘Cause we shouldn’t stand still, right?

10
00:00:46,640 --> 00:00:49,900
Life is a sham

11
00:00:49,900 --> 00:00:52,360
Don't say you can't do it

12
00:00:52,360 --> 00:00:59,840
Don’t say it

13
00:00:59,840 --> 00:01:07,520
Don’t say it’s too late now

14
00:01:07,520 --> 00:01:07,520
( )

15
00:01:07,520 --> 00:01:08,600
Come, come

16
00:01:08,600 --> 00:01:11,940
Now we form a circle and start to spin

17
00:01:11,940 --> 00:01:15,340
Bit by bit I come to hate it, but I come to like it

18
00:01:15,340 --> 00:01:18,760
Hey, hey, I don’t even understand the meeting of my selves

19
00:01:18,760 --> 00:01:20,500
We steadily close the gap

20
00:01:20,500 --> 00:01:21,920
But we remain far apart

21
00:01:21,920 --> 00:01:25,440
Da-dum, carried by the music we start to dance

22
00:01:25,440 --> 00:01:28,780
Wretchedly, I come to hate it, but I come to like it

23
00:01:28,780 --> 00:01:32,620
Hey, hey, I don’t understand now or ever

24
00:01:32,620 --> 00:01:35,560
Shake shake my heart

25
00:01:35,560 --> 00:01:36,560
Yay

26
00:01:36,560 --> 00:01:37,340
( )

27
00:01:37,340 --> 00:01:39,000
There’s no such thing as a right answer

28
00:01:39,000 --> 00:01:40,840
So, where the hell do I have to go

29
00:01:40,840 --> 00:01:41,840
To find the end of this story?

30
00:01:44,060 --> 00:01:45,700
Waiting for the “1, 2…” signal

31
00:01:45,700 --> 00:01:47,640
Touching your hand is

32
00:01:47,640 --> 00:01:48,640
An act of courage for me

33
00:01:48,640 --> 00:01:50,460
( )

34
00:01:50,460 --> 00:01:52,200
Phase <2>

35
00:01:52,200 --> 00:01:55,420
There’s no meaning to being humble and respectful

36
00:01:55,420 --> 00:01:58,800
So bye-bye to my embarrassing dreams

37
00:01:58,800 --> 00:02:01,040
From now on, forever, let’s get along

38
00:02:01,040 --> 00:02:02,780
Let’s get along.

39
00:02:02,780 --> 00:02:02,780
( )

40
00:02:02,780 --> 00:02:04,080
Come, come

41
00:02:04,080 --> 00:02:07,340
We now avert our eyes from each other

42
00:02:07,340 --> 00:02:10,680
Bit by bit I come to hate it, but I come to like it

43
00:02:10,680 --> 00:02:14,140
Hey, hey, I don’t even understand the meeting of my selves

44
00:02:14,140 --> 00:02:16,020
I steadily become better

45
00:02:16,020 --> 00:02:17,520
But I’m crumbling to pieces

46
00:02:17,520 --> 00:02:20,800
Da-dum, you disappear before I can touch you

47
00:02:20,800 --> 00:02:24,120
Wretchedly, I come to hate it, but I come to like it

48
00:02:24,120 --> 00:02:27,980
Hey, hey, I don’t understand now or ever

49
00:02:27,980 --> 00:02:48,940
Until we can understand each other, we-

50
00:02:48,940 --> 00:02:49,940
- Shouldn’t say it’s too late

51
00:02:49,940 --> 00:02:56,580
( )

52
00:02:56,580 --> 00:02:57,800
Come, come

53
00:02:57,800 --> 00:03:01,080
Now we form a circle and start to spin

54
00:03:01,080 --> 00:03:04,360
Bit by bit I come to hate it, but I come to like it

55
00:03:04,360 --> 00:03:07,960
Hey, hey, I don’t even understand the meeting of my selves

56
00:03:07,960 --> 00:03:09,680
We steadily close the gap

57
00:03:09,680 --> 00:03:11,100
But we remain far apart

58
00:03:11,100 --> 00:03:14,560
Da-dum, carried by the music we start to dance

59
00:03:14,560 --> 00:03:17,800
Wretchedly, I come to hate it, but I come to like it

60
00:03:17,800 --> 00:03:21,660
Hey, hey, I don’t understand now or ever

61
00:03:21,660 --> 00:03:24,660
Shake shake my heart

62
00:03:24,660 --> 00:03:25,660
Yay
